Boss wants her found and sends Rick, his right hand man, to do the searching with henchmen Aristotle and Max in tow. None of the lookouts have seen her, it's as if she's vanished. Everyone's looking for Roxy whilst Matt keeps his head down and Roxy hidden in his flat.

title: St Mary
description: Tejiri's love rejects him and in her desire for wealth and falls victim of a gang of human traffickers and organ thieves who are selling her and others into sex slaves. Will his best efforts and those of other victims families be enough to save their loved ones from the jaws of "Don Daddy", the wealthy, powerful and influential gang leader?

title: Tu es si jolie ce soir
description: When Deborah married Steve, a successful lawyer, it seemed perfect. But Deborah soon has to realize that her husband is not the man she thought she had married.

title: Abandoned in the Dark
description: Kane Hodder stars in this anthology film comprised of 4 short horror/suspense stories seamlessly connected to one another through gripping real life conflict and extreme tension.

title: Verdades y Mentiras
description: A drama about Maria whose fantasy takes into the surreal world of Cybersex, but the one night when she tries to make fantasy into reality danger lurks.

title: Luna de cigarras
description: A young American man comes to Paraguay to seal a deal and start a new business venture. The opportunity he represents creates a competition within a group that unexpectedly takes him on a journey into the bowels of the underworld.

title: The Boundary
description: A Cop Whose Wife Vanished Without A Trace Since 10 Years Past.He Was Accused Of Murdering A Tycoon's Wife After She Assasinated A Hostage Lady She Doubts Of Being A Mistress To Her Husband.In The Present Time The Tycoon's New Partner Is Brutally Assasinated.Suddenly The Cop Is Experiencing Nightmares And Sees Visions Of His Missing Wife,With The Help Of The Murdered Wife's Daughter They Must Uncover The Mysteries And Strange Connections To The Murders Happened Before Time Runs Out.

title: Devil's Point
description: The mysterious area of woods known to the locals as Devil's Point, harbors a dark secret no one suspects. After being attacked by something evil there, Michael finds that people in his life are dying in increasingly bizarre circumstances. With all signs pointing at him being the one responsible for their deaths, he begins to question his own reality and now must find some way of overcoming the tragedy that haunts him before it is too late.

title: Fade to White
description: Three stories set in the future, each 50 years apart but all in the same Central Park location, reveal that the unexpected consequences of love lost can echo across generations. 2019 - At winter's first snowfall, a married teacher cuts school to meet up with her much younger lover for what she hopes will be the last time. 2070 - A father-to-be desperately searches for a mysterious object that will save his unborn child while on the run from a cybernetic security officer and a man who will do anything to stop him. 2130 - A brother and sister, who have spent their whole lives underground are banished from the colony and must weather the inhospitable surface of a destroyed planet.

title: Down the Line
description: A struggling comedian wakes up trapped inside his mind and must fight alternate versions of himself to escape.

title: Hold'em
description: Former poker pro, Jake Emerson, joins an underground game with a million dollars at stake, but the entry fee is more than he bargained for.

title: The Scarecrow Club
description: The province of Ontario does the unthinkable. They elect the Nazi party to lead their government.

title: Night Shooter
description: A riveting police drama/thriller. A man is forced to make a pressured decision that forever alters his future.

title: The Road to Tophet
description: Charlie is a French-Canadian man involved in cross-border drug trade in Northern Ontario. After he decides he wants to leave the industry, his boss sets him up to force him to stay.

title: The Zwickys
description: A strong-willed woman by the name of Kayden Zwicky sets out on a journey to find the killer of her husband and avenge his death.

title: Creed of Gold
description: A cloak & dagger adventure about the Federal Reserve and the international financial conspiracy that threatens the world. Three heroic college students uncover the plot...and risk their lives to expose the secret syndicate. "Gripping drama" says Dove Fnd.

title: The Phone in the Attic
description: A young woman begins receiving phone calls from her dead mother.

title: Our Last Night
description: A close-knit group of seven high school friends decide to document their last night in town together in order to preserve memories they hope will last a lifetime. They take turns filming each other and all of their crazy adventures until unexpected secrets are revealed and events unfold that ultimately leads the pack to face a fatal twist.

title: Quiet River
description: When a recently divorced woman returns to the Appalachian mountains of her youth, she learns that her brilliant but troubled brother is implicated in an act of radical Eco-terrorism. As her own life falls apart, she works to uncover the dark truth at the heart of the matter -- and learns that blood is sometimes no thicker than water.

title: Terra Solanum
description: Journalist Will Vineyard returns to his backwater home-town to attend the funeral of an old friend, only to become caught up in a deadly viral outbreak. With time rapidly running short, and things not as they seem, Will must race to the bottom of this flesh-eating mystery before it claims his life.

title: Dawn (aka. Morgenrøde)
description: At the beginning of a new aeon is a water polluted world years after a global fall. Where the legacy of what was, has been quenched and world understanding must take shape again. Surrounded by an endless hazy and drab, bleak desert we follow two survivors who eye each other with the same mutual depraved suspicion as they contemplate their inhospitable surroundings.

title: Dead and Awake
description: What is fact and what is fantasy when a girl with psychic powers plays with the minds and reality of a gang that has kidnapped her?

title: Alex & Ali
description: The story of a gay American Peace Corp volunteer who moved to Iran in 1968 and fell in love with an Iranian man. Ten years on and just prior to the revolution igniting, the American was forced to leave Iran, and his partner. The couple was reunited after 35 years in May of 2012 in Turkey. Their reuniting takes an unexpected turn in Istanbul, now they face their biggest challenge.

title: Los muertos también bailan
description: Six stories joined by a literature teacher who imagines them. Reality begins to mix with fiction in this film where in each story there must be at least one dead person.

title: Vizhi Moodi Yosithaal
description: KG(K.G.Senthil Kumar) has a gift of seeing 5 minutes into his future. But he would not be able to see when he is intoxicated with alcohol or while he is sleeping. KG doesn't realise that he has got a gift until the girl he loved with heart and soul Niki(Nikita) is killed by a group of 4 terrorists right in front of his eyes while he had consumed alcohol. Once he realises that if he wouldn't have had alcohol he could have saved Niki's life, KG quits drinking and sets on a mission to take revenge on the culprits who killed Niki using his Extra-Sensory Perception.

title: Hide and Go Seek
description: A young man and his friends must survive a horrific night of hide and seek from his grandfather who begins to relive moments of his grim war days in Vietnam.

title: Sutrula
description: A couple elopes to Ooty and marries with the help of their friends. Soon enough, their friends are captured by a mystery man who wants them to play a 'game of death' with them. What's his motive?

title: The Tailor's Apprentice
description: Inspired by true events, "The Tailor's Apprentice" depicts a struggling father-son relationship in the midst of a drug smuggling scheme.

title: The Human Virus
description: Paranoia spreads like a virus when a crew of land surveyors encounter psychotic campers possibly infected with an unknown sickness.

title: The Monkey's Paw
description: A curious father makes a wish on a cursed monkey's paw only to suffer the consequences at the expense of his family.

title: Paranoia Park
description: A woman argues with her daughter in the park, few minutes later, the daughter is held captive by a maniac, The mother has to execute insane actions for the next sixty minutes if she wants to see again her daughter.

title: Samuel's Game
description: A young artist moves into an old apartment building in Brooklyn, New York, and his life begins to unravel by the appearance of a woman who was murdered in his bedroom during the 1940s.

title: The Honeymoon
description: A young couple is thrust into a deadly game of cat and mouse after they trek deep into the wilderness on a honeymoon canoe trip and become targets of a vengeful family.

title: Lucifer's Night
description: Seven years ago, a man convinced Lucifer was within him brutally murdered his wife and child. Now, Eric and Hayley move into the same house after years of being left unsold on the market. They think they got a good deal with the house, a bargain in fact. But what they don't know is that evil still lurks within the house and is awaiting more souls to take.

title: Kalpanthe Sihinayak
description: It is essentially a love story between an architect and a beautiful village girl. The architect, Kalpa (Channa), travels to a hill country village for work and it is there that meets Menaka (Chaithra). Kalpana faces many challenges with a local group of thugs secretly investigating King Ravan's Ancestry Book. Menaka is a part of Ravan's Ancestry. Her father was murdered by some hidden enemies because of a conflict over a secret document regarding the Ravan Ancestry. Kalpa gets more intrigued about this matter and turns to the monk at the village temple for advice.

title: Ceci n'est pas un polar
description: At Montreal, a lonely and embittered cab driver starts his own investigation in order to break the secret of a passenger he fell in love with.

title: Los Reyes: La verdadera historia de Buster y El Camaleón
description: A Puerto Rican drug convict escapes from jail and flees to Santo Domingo, where he continues his drug business and meets a woman who becomes his lover.

title: The Night Runner
description: Talia Flynn runs at night to try and catch up with her lost love, pushing her fragile heart to the limit. Casey Willmott saves lives, a maverick heart surgeon frustrated with the professional red tape stopping his theories on nanotechnology being implemented. When Talia is rushed into hospital and assessed by Casey, her eyes are opened to the potential about her heart both physically and emotionally. Casey is drawn to Talia and tries to show her how she can be saved. Choosing to run again Talia pushes her heart past its limit into the arms of her lost love. Casey, finding her collapsed goes to revive her. Will he for fill his promise of saving everyone or break his own heart and let her go.

title: Mr. Righteous
description: James Righteous, your typical "nice guy" walks uninterrupted through an average, quiet life. But his comfortable routine is about to change. There just comes a point when you're finally pushed past your limits and are forced to be . . . not so nice.

title: Exit 13
description: It was supposed to be the perfect getaway but Adam Payson and four friends are spun into a nightmare when a series of terrifying events forces them to Exit 13, trapping them in an abandoned cabin and in a race to escape the evil within.

title: Tres mentiras
description: 1971. Three pregnant teenagers are interned in a flat in Bilbao to hide what in that time was a terrible disgrace, to be a single mother. Current time. Violet, NORA NAVAS, is a brave, strong woman that will insist on finding the truth. Helped by Angel, MIKEL LOSADA, what happened in that flat in Bilbao during the last days of Franco regime.

title: Mobilize
description: An investigative documentary that explores the potential long-term health effects from cell phone radiation, including cancer and infertility.

title: Vicissitudes
description: Two criminal masterminds reunite to run the biggest mission of their lives.

title: Contrast
description: Fraternal twins who were abandoned shortly after birth. Taken in by an abusive couple, the boys grow up to work together as contract killers; one is the hit-man while the other is the cleaner.

title: Two Smart
description: A disgruntled married couple and a hitchhiker are trapped in a gully during a tropical storm.

title: Organize Chaos
description: In a complex web of tales within a tale, spanning two continents and involving a multitude of characters, Organize Chaos juxtaposes drama, action and humor in the world of organized crime. The business of the underworld has its own unwritten rules. Among them is rule Number one: Never cheat your business associates. And when these rules are broken, the guilty must be punished with a vengeance. There is always one man who emerges to bring order back in the business. He will be the judge, the jury and the executioner. But to bring back order again, he must first Organize Chaos. His name is Mike and he will show no mercy.

title: Dodo
description: 'Dodo' is a thriller that mixes different genres and styles, from comedy to films of Mexican wrestlers. It follows the story of a cop with a reputation for being an idiot who jumps on the trail of a missing girl, discovering that his best friend is involved. Along the way they encounter a series of strange characters, typical inhabitants of Mexico City. Everything takes place in a day, from morning to night.

title: The Coldest Kiss
description: Mattie escapes an abusive home from her wealthy arranged husband, Floyd, with the help of Floyd's nephew, Thomas. Floyd now attempts to bring them back with intentions of murderous revenge while employing the help of anyone he can buy.

title: Dayom Panthrandum
description: The film shares several characteristics with the game such as its unpredictability, adventure, thrill - all rolled into one. The film is about a group of youngsters who set out on a mission. They travel far and wide. While four of them are in a car, the 'Boss' of the group is on a bike, alone, as if expecting a pillion rider at any moment. They meet a tribal man who falls in their focus as well as their camera's. The new entrant guides them to new twists and turns. He guides them from the ease and comfort of film making to the harshness of reality which the forest unfolds.

title: Cilla
description: An aspiring artist and college senior is throwing the biggest party of the year. The seniors arrive at the party not knowing that they are all key players in a social experiment that will change everything.

title: Desha: The Leader
description: The winner of a political reality show makes a simple man a national hero.

title: The Girl in Me
description: From the makers of Delhi Belly, comes a story of Tina and her double Tara, two ambitious girls who are trying to find their feet in the big city.

title: The Other Side
description: Which side will you choose when evil takes over...

title: Antha Akkade Jarigindi
description: The story revolves around a game that is conducted by a TV show. The host of the show selects the participants and holds them in a bungalow. However, neither he nor the participants are aware that the bungalow is haunted.

title: Solo
description: Tomas is in the military and has a promising future ahead of him; however, his blind son hears things that others cannot perceive and knows something shocking is about to happen.

title: Dys-
description: Forced to barricade themselves in their apartment, a young couple is brought to the edge of the already existing divide between them.

title: Los enemigos del dolor
description: A German actor lands in Montevideo. After his arrival, he gets lost and runs into a group of young men who try to rob him. He meets Pedro, an ex-addict in his forties and Nelson, a laconic security guard whose wife has left him.

title: Yokai
description: Lydia (28) works at Mr. Yokai's jewelry store and knows that he keeps a valuable diamond in his mysterious house. In order to help her ill sister, she decides to steal it and asks her friend Juan (27) for help.

title: Fever Dreams
description: In the vein of Twilight Zone and Tales from the Crypt, four spellbinding vignettes of suspense draw the viewer into FEVER DREAMS. In part one, The Agent, an alcoholic screenplay middleman becomes trapped in acting out a nightmare scripted especially for him. Next, in The Entertainer, our host reveals on national television a tragic love story... and the contents of his coffee table. This is followed by a concise vignette on the importance of Timed Romance. And in The Cameraman, a wannabee movie-maker's documentary turns into a real life horror story!

title: Adriane's Truth
description: While on a walk, Adriane stumbles upon a large crystal and decides to wish on it. When her wish comes true and she ends up in the future, Adriane must deal with danger, deceit, and devious foes while trying to find her way back home.

title: My Reprisal
description: A non linear recap of two families unknowingly intertwined and ultimately responsible for the death of countless innocent people.

title: In 10 Easy Steps
description: High school student, GIORGIA EAST (Deborah Tabone), who has been tested at genius level, has her dream of pursuing an International Degree in Finance hit a wall when her teacher, JOHN BALATRO (Antonios Baxevanidis), fails her creative writing assignment entitled "How To Rob a Bank in Ten Easy Steps". Determined to prove her teacher wrong and demonstrate that by following her ten step plan the bank can be taken for millions. Giorgia skips school, walks into a regional bank branch and holds up the teller, Isaak Misidis (Costas Mandylor) at gun point. The teller triggers the silent alarm, locking down the bank's computer systems and enacting its security protocol, also alerting the police to the attempted robbery. Called to the scene is decorated veteran Detective MAURICE ROPER (Louis Mandylor) - once a hot shot with the LAPD - and his partner, Detective TINA JOYCE (Kim King). No sooner do Roper and Joyce arrive at the bank than they set up a command center and call in the Special Weapons and Tactics Unit, preparing for the worse. Giorgia's armed robbery attempt draws the interest of local reporters, led by insatiable journalist TIFFANY EAVES (Katharine Innes) who breaks the story on the midday news. Watching the news report while grading papers at home, John Balatro retrieves Giorgia's failed writing assignment and presents it to the Detectives. With Giorgia's assignment in hand, Roper and Joyce believe they know Giorgia's plan in full and can stay one step ahead of her. What ensues is a high-paced game of cat-and-mouse between Giorgia and Detective Roper as both try to out-fox the other.

title: Old Denton Road
description: An ancient terror is unleashed upon the lives of two young friends, and it looks a little like death! When two young women try to locate a lost campsite, they are abducted by an indigenous and savage group of ancient creatures hell bent on their own survival. At whatever the cost, a rescue mission is attempted, and lives will be taken as the true form of this mysterious species is revealed. The question is not who will survive, but who will survive at all? It's Deliverance meets The Hills Have Eyes mixed with one part Mad Max and an ounce of Wrong turn thrown in for good measure. It's going to be a tale of terror for the ages.

title: Sanctuary
description: Four people in a high rise condo fight for their lives against a malevolent force that seeks to destroy them. But when a mysterious being in a familiar body finds them, the group discovers what's truly at stake.

title: Nasi Tangas
description: Hairi and Fatin are close friends. Mira, who is also Fatin's best friend, admits that she likes Hairy. Fatin helps them to unite and get married. Over the years, Mira is jealous of Hairi's friendship with Fatin. Hairi's mother persuades Mira to make 'nasi kangkang' in order for Hairi to obey her. To achieve her intention, Mira is willing to sleep with the shaman.

title: Nowhere
description: An unspeakable nightmare begins when a group of travelers are lost in the remote hills of the Scottish Highlands, with no hope of rescue. Seeking refuge in a creepy lodge for a night puts all of their lives in danger. The horror surges as they find themselves relentlessly pursued by a force of evil beyond their imagination!

title: Couvre-feu
description: After a horrific car accident, Valentine continues her physiotherapy at a seaside resort, but a violent storm leads to a curfew which cuts it off from the rest of the world. In this tense atmosphere, Valentine hears a woman cry out, then a muffled scream. Crime or her overflowing imagination?

title: Schimbare
description: Luis and Elvira travel to Romania after contact an Eastern European criminal organization. Near their destination, they receive a call that requires them to change the route. They must stop in Budapest and make a collection.

title: Four Kinds of Love
description: A casting director falls for a contract gardener during the spree of a serial killer.

title: X Wins
description: A young man practices for a triathlon deep in the thick forest. A beautiful young woman and her brother have broken down in the middle of the same forest. Three ominous gun- wielding hunters stop to help. A game of TIC-TAC-TOE is played and goes bad. All hell brakes loose and a game of cat and mouse ensures. The only way out is if X-WINS.

title: El círculo de Raynard
description: A film crew are making a documentary about Frederich Raynard, a nazi war criminal, expert in occultism who could have ended his days in a town in northern Spain. What starts as an easy job soon will become a dark adventure that will change their lives forever. With Raynard diary in their hands and chased by a secret organization, they will look for Macias help, a parapsychology professor. By him, they will soon find out their lives are in danger and the only way to save themselves is to perform one of the rituals from Raynard diary. The ritual that caused Raynard death years back.

title: The Life Exchange
description: Samantha Richards had everything, until her past changed all that.

title: Long Dark Road
description: The fate of 4 kids will change forever, in a way they would have never imagined. A chance meeting of strangers trying to forget the past, little do they know, it would come back and haunt them. Their lives spiral down a series of unexpected events.

title: Sign
description: Jim Thompson received a phone call from a dead man-a man he watched die one drunken, adulterous night while out of town on business. Jim's wife, Deirdre, doesn't know his secret. Neither does Detective Frank Gibbons, who is hot on the case of the year-old crime. In this supernatural thriller, Jim's past surfaces through his guilt and lies. As Detective Gibbons closes in on the truth, Jim and Deirdre must run from a malevolent stalker in this terrifying tale of deception and murder.

title: Dark Tarot
description: Four wealthy country club wives come to an empty mansion to bid on the diary of a deceased pool boy who they all had affairs with. Once there, a Goth spirit medium hired to scare them actually opens the door to the other realm and the ghost of the deceased refuses to let anyone leave until he finishes playing all his cards.

title: The Vendor
description: In the vein of Alfred Hitchock Presents, a dark tale of self-indulgent revenge... Fired from a lifetime of work, museum curator Roger Kincade attempts hold hostage and seduce an elderly woman, out of a valuable antique.

title: Anak Jantan
description: This action-thriller that tells the story of Darin who is haunted by a past life. His negative lifestyle changes once he falls for a young lady from his village named Nara. Soon, the couple migrate to KL city to leave behind Darin's indecent past and to start a new life. They are blessed with a bright and intelligent son, Saufi. Alas, their family's happiness doesn't last long with the arrival of Somchai, an old colleague who has returned to cause unrest at Darin's workplace.

title: Tembus
description: About a couple who have a great life and successful careers. But one day everything changes for the worst when their only child Zara, goes missing.

title: Grim Reapers
description: A teenager and his friends become terrorized by dark hooded figures after his father goes missing at a remote house in the woods.

title: HorrorCon
description: A young female vendor attends a horror convention after suffering a terrible personal tragedy where she was raped and her boyfriend was murdered. Addicted to pain pills and battling mental and physical torment, she can barely endure returning to a place that strains her once joyous memories through a filter of loneliness, heartache and despair. Soon, she's pursued by a mysterious celebrity author who happens to collect vials of blood for autographs and who may be able to offer her one final chance at a future...one that could mean changing everything she knows about being alive.

title: Vegas Vikings
description: Christian Schoyen, a direct descendant of Viking King Ragnvaldsson, journeys to Vegas to kick off the Vegas Vikings Game. As project director, he assembles a Viking team, securing a 75% crime drop with his 10-challenge transformative game.

title: Why Do I Cry?
description: Complications caused by a stranger lead to dire consequences and ultimately the collapse of Natalie's world but with the help of a close friend Natalie seeks revenge.

title: Vineri searã
description: 3 dark, grim stories, with a deadly ending, combined together by a radio announcer with a sadistic sense of humor. This stories have one resemblance: all of them happened on a Friday Night. So...Now come on, sit down and listen. I know that you like to listen to - Dark stories. - For Friday night.

title: Psympatico
description: A family vacations at a cabin in the woods only to be terrorized by a band of masked psychopaths.

title: Talking Back at Thunder
description: Jacob's life is uprooted by the reappearance of a childhood demon. After attempting in vain to wrest his anguish, he forces himself upon his enemy. A battle of justice, morality, and life ensues for both Jacob and his foe.

title: Amerikan Violence
description: A rebellious youth blaming society for wrongful incarceration reunites with friends to terrorize the good citizens of Detroit by abducting random victims then forcing them to perform in their twisted online show, Amerikan Violence.

title: Adios Vaya Con Dios
description: Inspired by real events a day of reckoning approaches for Rory, a rising Irish-Mexican street gang member, when his trusted life-long friend Eloy, is released from prison.

title: Upstart
description: Three executives from an ambitious junior mining company find themselves the prime suspects in an international gold mining fraud.

title: Dreadtime Stories
description: A party turns bizarre when a malevolent book makes its way into the hands of the attendees who reveal its tales of monsters, madmen and the supernatural.

title: Yuukai shoujo
description: One sister is in the third year of junior high school while the other is in the third year of high school. Their parents are divorced. They were often beaten when they lived with both parents. They are traumatized. Talking about education and next steps one day the older sister bemoans how they cannot afford the next step. The younger sister, however, knows that their father has money. They decide to steal the money.

title: Beyond the Dark
description: Eight depictions of horror twisted into one feature film with unpredictable turns at the end of each segment.

title: RiffTrax Presents: Scared to Death
description: Was there ever a more seminal film than Scared to Death? By kicking off with a body in a mortuary narrating the story, this classy horror-mystery served as the blueprint for Sunset Boulevard over a decade later.

title: A Hitman's Solitude Before the Shot
description: The over-ambitious Koralnik has a dream job: he is a contract killer for a secret EU programme. But even eight years after his training he still hasn't had a single hit. Bored and frustrated, he lives according to the programme's strict rules - withdrawn, no social contact and constantly undercover. One day, the shy Rosa crashes into his car and life. Before he knows it, Koralnik is having dinner with her. For the first time, he can flee his everyday misery for an evening of company. But then the telephone rings. It's Koralnik's first job. With Rosa alongside, Koralnik sets off on a chaotic odyssey through a night in which nothing goes according to plan. It is only when Koralnik's target is revealed to be none other than one of his colleagues that the rigid concept by which he lives finally comes into question. He is confronted with the dilemma of either protecting his secret programme or drawing a line under his unfulfilled existence as a killer. It is the biggest liar of them all, Rosa, who forces him to confront his own life's lie.
originalTitle: Die Einsamkeit des Killers vor dem Schuss

title: The Society
description: A young man dies an untimely death and finds himself in a dangerous netherworld between heaven and hell where souls struggle to find salvation.

title: Day Night Game
description: Day Night Game is a 2014 Malayalam movie directed by Shibu Prabhakar starring Jithan Ramesh, Maqbool Salmaan, Archana Kavi and Bhagath Manuel. The movie is produced by Shyju NP and the music composed by Jinosh Antony.

title: Still Flowin': The Movie
description: This movie follows the story of Raed Melki fighting against Michael Gudinski and his fellow accomplices in their mission to stop him from succeeding in his rapping career.

title: Der Mann ohne Schatten
description: Eccentric, hedonistic Berlin lawyer Joachim Vernau leaves remodeling the practice to his practical partner -or given her fall the nosy neighbor crones- to accept a strange mission: check in Habana if Katherina Gebhardt rightly assumed having seen a glimpse of him on a flight thereto, never having got a word since his disappearance during the Cold war after a 1980 violent demonstration, and settle their father's inheritance. Vernau sort of stumbles on the rail at his hotel, in the persons of a fake hostess, a henchman of the elusive Martin Gebhardt and someone even closer to him. Attempts to scare him off and even advice from the German embassy failing, Vernaus is invited to Martin's Cuban estate, where he lives with his daughter. Vernau happily accepts the signing over of all rights on the family home, and the refusal even to consider contacting Katharine, but she claims it's an impostor. Vernau reluctantly accepts to stay on and find out, in which process nobody proves who they seemed so far.

title: Paranoia
description: Akiko Takagi, a housewife, has been feeling somewhat anxious this spring. Lately her father-in-law Kazuo, who lives with the family, is showing signs of dementia. Her husband Yuichi has been frustrated since he was dispatched to work at a subsidiary. He never listens to Akiko now. One day, her Father-in-law couldn't find his way home. She was worried her father-in-law, but when she mentioned it to her husband he cut her off, saying his father is OK. The next day, her father-in-law noticed that his dead wife's ring, had disappeared from the Takagi family altar. Since then he has been acting weirdly. With those eerie developments, The Takagi family fell apart. Finally the demonic energy that had been building in her family exploded.

title: Malignant Spirits: Sense of Fiction
description: Friday, December 13th 2013, the final Friday the 13th of the year, brought in a new kind of creature. They Hunt. They Devour. They Leave.

title: The Trespasser
description: A dramatic feature that follows the life of Kaeya, a rape victim, and her friends after a devastating moment that changes her life forever.

title: The Innocent Killer
description: A young girl is haunted by a crazy killer that seems too innocent.

title: Fading Sanity
description: Seven patients escape from Woodhollow Mental Health Center, leaving the whole state intensely looking for these escaped patients. Mack, a twenty-one year old man living with his alcoholic father, comes across the patients in the woods and quickly realizes that he and they have many similarities. Mack offers them help and leaves his troubled home life to live with the patients in an abandoned building.

title: Nero Fiddles
description: A story like no other, "Truth" explores the deep-rooted psychological traumas that affect so many in our society. With subject matters like addiction, pedophilia, abuse, crime and manipulation we will enter a dark and disturbing world where love is the catalyst for destruction. A very good-looking master manipulator, Caleb is the driver of our story. Hailing from an abusive childhood, he is now in a relationship that ultimately sends him over the edge. When learning that is his affair with Jeremy has other variables such as an 8month pregnant wife, it propels Caleb in a never-ending vindictive streak who's end result is to destroy Jeremy and all that he holds dear. The films core is rooted in relationships and the inner workings of the human condition when exposed to such psychological threats.

title: Gila Baby
description: Gila Baby is a comedy film directed by Khabir Bhatia and starred by Beto Kusyairy, Nadiya Nisaa, Fimie Don, Sharnaaz Ahmad, Adlin Aman Ramlie, Jalil Hamid and Lan Pet Pet. This film tells Bob (Beto Kusyairy) who needs a lot of money to finance The cost of his father's surgery at the hospital. Had to take the easy road, Bob helped Roy (Sharnaaz Ahmad) steal the car and eventually found a baby in the back seat of the car. The movie was publicly aired on December 4, 2014.

title: El Psiquiatra
description: Venezuelan Movie about The true story of Edmundo Chirinos, Venezuelan psychiatrist, a crazy psycho.

title: Sexy Montañita
description: Two best friends take a trip to Montanita where they have an epic party. The events later that night will change them forever.

title: Ivy
description: Ivy is a serial killer who has evaded capture for 1 year, but Detective Trent stumbles upon 2 deaths, on the anniversary of the first confirmed Ivy murder, which will raise questions about what he thought he knew.

title: El mal del arriero
description: In a world of men who are insecure, immature and unpunished, playing with the other people is the way that leads to entertainment - and crime.

title: The Mysterious Death of Pérola
description: Away from home, living alone in an old and gloomy apartment, Pérola feels the effects of the time passing, being increasingly taken by nostalgia and fear to a point where dream, fantasy and reality lose its borders.

title: Besondere Schwere der Schuld
description: Joseph Komalschek returns to his old neighborhood - thirty years after he was convicted for the murders of a young woman and her newborn child, a crime he never confessed.

title: Serenity Farm
description: Undisturbed for over 20 years, this remote forested island in the Pacific Northwest is visited by a group of campers on horseback. The camp tranquility is broken by violence and terror.

title: Killing Mr. Right
description: Convinced her roommate's new fiancé is the man who abducted and raped her, a young law student, suffering from post traumatic stress disorder, takes justice into her own hands as she exacts revenge - but does she have the right man?

title: Filosofía Natural del Amor
description: A cinematic essay that takes us through different couples who allow us to penetrate their intimacy. Irene and Federico meet by chance after ten years of not seeing each other. Manuel is thirty-six; he begins a relationship with Alma, a girl of fifteen. Porfirio has hidden sexual desires. Jacca and Sae get lost in a mangrove swamp. Reflecting on relationships, sex, fidelity, love and death, it juxtaposes insect sexual behavior with human sexual behavior, our most primitive desire. Love is deeply animal, and therein lays its beauty.

title: Tysyacha
description: Emilia, a journalist from Moscow, has everything - name and fame, wealth, spectacular career and family well being - but nothing brings her happiness. Trying to pull her out of life crisis her family members and colleagues impose on her conventional way of life but it gives no results. She closed herself in dark empty room, keeping her head at gunpoint and starts to count from one to thousand. The dark room becomes like a time machine which throws a heroine into the past events in the labyrinth of her life, the labyrinth which has the only one way out now - HELL.

title: Keeper of the Realm
description: Three rescuers search for missing tourists in a cave. After hours of searching, they find an ancient treasure. After they take everything, the vault's guardian poisons their minds with greed, leading to their destruction.

title: Hwasangorae
description: Ha-jin has the ability to communicate with whales - a fact she keeps hidden. One day, a woman asks Ha-jin to join her in the gules whale hunt. She grows curious about the gules whale and learns that every crew member has a sad gules story.

title: On the Surface
description: A story about how loss can affect people differently and how high school student Ron Silver, through a series of unfortunate events and mistakes, deals with it.

title: Crusade
description: The cult you already belong to.

title: Difuminado
description: A mysterious old man and a dark past made up of classic cars, beautiful women and the excesses of his youth.

title: The Shadow Inside
description: A man struggles with his identity following a tragic event which has torn his life apart. Unable to move forward and overcome his pain, he creates a plan to help him escape it.

title: Gogoler Kirti
description: Based on Samaresh's popular Gogol fiction Mahish Mardini Uddhar and Rai Raja Uddhar, the film unfolds with a 'sabeki' puja in a Bengal village, where all members of the once-royal household assemble during that time of year and Gogol will take us back to the time when joint households were in vogue. Gogol is in a way the younger version of Feluda who is gadget savvy, knows mob applications, has contemporary tastes and upbringing but still loves to be in a joint family and calls its members 'pisi-na kaka-didibhai-chhotomama etc. He never uses a tab but sharpens his 'magojastro'.

title: Blood Brothers
description: A Bloodied and battered Man awakes in the middle of the forest. Not knowing where he is and suffering from memory loss, he stumbles across a severely injured man. With time against them, they attempt to search for help despite the unknown threat that awaits.

title: Um Conto De Batman: Na Psicose Do Ventríloquo
description: In a facility on Gotham City, Batman discovers the mob changing medications for mental patients. However, is in this facility that we go deep into a behavioral, psychological and social study of characters who did not want but were caught in the crime life. A tale of the Brazilian life through the eyes of pop culture.

title: Omega: Real Life Superhero
description: A recent college grad documents his friend's process of becoming a real-life superhero, with unforeseen consequences.

title: Slender
description: Based on the Internet sensation, Slenderman, "Slender" tells the horrific tale of how five teenagers discover the truth behind the mystery of the disappearances occurring in the small Tennessee town where they live. What they find, though, is a secret darker than they imagined and an even darker discovery that catches them in a terrifying game of fate.

title: Monster School: A New Sitcom
description: Imagine the classic monster characters - Frankenstein's Monster, Count Dracula, The Mummy, The Bride of Frankenstein, and The Wolf Man - in their first day of school, being taught by a genuine horror hostess: Ivonna Cadaver.

title: Words of the Damned
description: Anais, a young woman whose lover has died, awakes from an unsettling dream: the man she loved has written a letter in an attempt to contact her from beyond the grave. Upon waking, she finds the note by her bedside. As her journey through temptations, lies, and hallucinations begins, she struggles, driven by hope, that love survives the grave. Or has she, in fact, lost her mind?

title: Til Night Redux
description: Ray Steppin, a small-town sheriff in the mountains of Syzygy County Alaska is awakened early one morning with a hangover of steep proportions. He's summoned to the gruesome crime scene where a bevy of bodies have been found at a remote cabin; and one is still breathing. As the investigation deepens and night begins to fall, it becomes more and more clear that what Ray and his deputies (and the local coroner/priest) are up against isn't natural and that nothing is what it seems.

title: Searching for Katie
description: SEARCHING FOR KATIE is a docu-style thriller in which Taryn investigates the disappearance of a young girl and her connection to an underground cult based in Los Angeles. As she continues her search, the facts become more hazy, and the threats become more real. Who is telling the truth? And what ever happened to Katie? Interwoven with interviews from former cult members and mind control experts, the film also includes videos from Taryn's fans and several digital video bonus surprises.

title: Human Interest
description: A veteran Journalist and his young Cameraman hike into the isolated wilderness to film a routine 'human interest' story. Their subject is a young Biological Scientist with a point to prove. When her research Assistant disappears and her study animals turn up slaughtered, paranoia sets in. It soon becomes apparent that there is something else out there in the wilderness - something not human.

title: Gamer or Hacker?
description: Two adult gamers spend their time playing on line. They manage to take control of a killer robot in the real world. Do they have to shut it down or to use it at their own advantage?

title: Tuhi Mera Pehla Pyar
description: The Story Is About 3 Friends Rahul, Seema and Salman. Where Rahul's First Love Is Money And Seemas First Love Is Rahul And Salman First Love Is USA. Vicky's First love is Power, Who Is Genius But Criminal At Mind. Studied at The Same Campus, After Graduating They All Start Exploring Their Careers Using Their Talent, Vicky Get A Job With Underworld Don. Rahul Exploits The Rich And Gets Trapped Into A Dons Daughter Rajni 's Affair, Who Goes After To Marry Him At A Gun Point. Seema, An Homely Girl Who Loves Rahul. Salman Works Towards Fulfilling His Dream To Migrate USA And Seeks Financial Help From Rahul. Hyderabadi Comedy By Detectives.*Beautiful Music And A Clean Family Film. A must watch movie...

title: Trouble
description: When you go looking for trouble, you may get more then you can handle.

title: Auguste
description: A fired office worker steals from a feared loan shark and is haunted by premonitory dreams.

title: Gefällt mir
description: A young woman from Heide (Germany) finds purpose in her life by hunting down killers and sexual offenders, facing a show-down with a notorious serial killer who stalks his victims online and publishes their deaths in the social network.

title: Corporate
description: Toy company desk jockey, Tucker McIntyre, is thrown into the dark and dangerous world of corporate espionage when he learns that he's really a top corporate spy recovering from a serious brain trauma - and that his entire world is a lie. .

title: The Torment of Laurie Ann Cullom
description: A woman who suffers from agoraphobia soon realizes her fear of the outside world is nothing compared to what she finds in her home.

title: A Dealer's Iniquity
description: A dark, crime story surrounding Luke Williams attempting to make profit as a drug dealer while experiencing an irresistible state of cocaine addiction. It only gets harder for him to pay back the money that is owed to the hands of intimidating, violent cocaine supplier, Terrence. When the tension elevates, it's only a shot away from a massacre.

title: The Man in the Chair
description: A single mother grieving the loss of her only child does what the police have failed to do. She finds the hit and run driver responsible for her daughter's death and imprisons him in her home.

title: Into Dust
description: In a dystopian future, the world is split into two sectors: The Poor, and The Rich. They are ruled by the oppressive and secretive 'Sector' who have a law to send people's worst fears to their houses to torture and slaughter them if they have committed a crime. These executions are plastered over television programmes and films, however, the media-hungry society see this only as fiction. A group intent on watching The Sector crumble begin to make their move.

title: The Anatomy of Monsters
description: Andrew lures a woman to a motel room with homicidal intentions. He quickly discovers that she may be more dangerous than he could ever imagine. What follows is a deadly game of wits, and a soul-baring confession.

title: Double-Cross
description: Effie Howard (Ama K. Abebrese) a streetwise programmer's life is dramatically turned upside down when her fiancé Ben Boateng (Adjetey Anang) is convicted and sentenced for a bank robbery he did not commit. Determined to prove his innocence; she carried out her own investigation and finds the actual robber; Danny Frimpong (John Dumelo) a calm and collected sophisticated genius of a thief who has a personal vendetta against the bank he robbed Neptune Bank International. He robbed the bank using urbane technology which enabled him to enter, steal and exit the bank leaving everyone mystified as to how the theft was carried out, no witnesses, no evidence, yet the money is gone. She meets Danny and threatens him but later offers him a deal; and it's to rob the bank again with similar methods as the first so the authorities know the actual robber is still out there, then Danny will not lose what matters to him most and the reason for the bank robbery. She plans to relocate with the stolen money and start a new life with Ben when he is acquitted so as to get away from the stigma attached to ex-convicts and their families. They are successful in the robbing the bank, Effie now sets her sights on a jewellery warehouse and she wants Danny to rob it. With a lot of jewellery and money at stake, each one of them tries to outwit each other with medleys of smart thinking as they plan and execute the robberies. They meticulously plan the robberies, but no amount of careful planning or expertise can prepare them for the dangerous enemy, an enemy Effie least expected and never saw coming; an unexpected turn of events on the day of the robbery, what happened?

title: Border Break
description: Janet Taylor and a group of college students take a road trip to Mexico for Spring Break. While en route they stumbled upon a roadblock that forces them to take a detour, which leads down a dangerous path of kidnapping and murder.

title: Ragnarock's Cabin
description: A honeymoon retreat goes south when the newlyweds find a group of rowdy friends in THEIR cottage! Apparently the cottage is double booked and neither side willing to leave they tough it out, but in the morning things go from bad to worse...

title: The Secret Agent in the Service of Good Taste
Komatose
description: Living in the past has never felt so real.

title: Pieces of 8
description: The film deals with a young woman doomed to repeat the same horrific, and downright surreal, experience, over and over.

title: The Dark Knight: Knightfall - Part Three
description: Crimson's grip tightens as his plans come to life, and the only ones who can stop him are Reclaimer and the Defenders.

title: Hysperia
description: A traumatized young man hunts down three child molesters who may have kidnapped his little brother.

title: Sherlock Holmes and People of Tomorrow
description: A mystery of four players hidden in a chopped off head.

title: Bury
description: Six hipsters from Brooklyn escape the city for a weekend in the woods. They want to film the entire weekend on Go Pro cameras. Why not? It's cheap to make movies these days. All six are addicted to the Internet and their phones, even though the idyllic house they found online has no WiFi and there's no cell connection. They get ready to have a party, make a sex tape, drink, smoke weed and take stupid photos. They're all so self assured and can't imagine anything bad will ever happen to them. When suddenly a mysterious presence starts seeking them out, they start to turn on each other and everything they believe in.

title: Riven
description: Every night, Tom Kleinert has the same apocalyptic nightmares. When the people he sees there start dying under mysterious circumstances, he is faced with the terrible possibility that his dreams may be portents of things to come - and that the world really is coming to an end...

title: Petecuy, La Película
description: In search of a financial backing, a director pitches the movie he wants to make to a group of potential investors. He intends to document on location the process of disarming and disbanding the youth gangs in Petecuy, one of the Colombia's most dangerous neighborhoods. Heading up the disarmament is process is Catholic priest Father Edilson Huerfano, his position puts him at odds with to Donal, the mafia boss in the area whose power reaches deep into the establishment. The film takes the spectator into distinct realities that are constantly closing in and reducing the fine line between fact and fiction.

title: The Lawful Truth
description: As each suspect twists the truth in his or her favor, a frustrated investigator attempts to figure out what ultimately led to the death of a young law student.

title: The Almosts
description: In a post-apocalyptic future, a masked vigilante searches for his parents while outrunning a relentless arms dealer bent on destroying him.

title: Umbara Point
description: A hit-man, an accountant and two thugs have ripped off their boss, a vicious Nairobi crime-lord. In a spiral of greed, violence and betrayal, is there honour amongst thieves -- or will any of the men actually get out of this situation alive?

title: Kryption
description: Aaron Kahn has had nightmares for as long as he can remember. He never thought much of them until one day he came across his great grandfather's journal. That's when his dreams started changing. Now between his secretive girlfriend, Jade Bradley, and his friends becoming more and more disturbed, things have become increasingly complicated. Throw in the fact that someone else has plans for the journal and it leaves Aaron with unanswered questions: What's so important about the journal? Why does someone else want it? What do his dreams mean?

title: Gifts from Strangers
description: A social media Vblogger and his close friends find themselves the victims of an unending series of pranks after opening a mysterious package sent from an online friend, pranks that soon take a more sinister and deadly turn.

title: El Alambrista: La Venganza
description: El Alambrista Mexican wrestler and defender of migrants uncovers a terrifying plot that turns bordering crossing migrants into monsters. A tough vigilante, Roy Willcox, played by WWE superstar Jake the Snake Roberts, is terrorizing migrant trying to cross the border. Willcox's mistreatment of the migrants along the US-Mexico border brings him face to mask with El Alambrista, the people's luchador. While trying to help the migrants being targeted by Willcox, our hero uncovers a terrifying plot to exploit the already forgotten border crossers. An evil lurks in the hidden canyons and concealed migrant trails of the border lands - Dr. Deralius, a man seeking revenge upon the migrant workers for a horrible accident that left him paralyzed. Also fighting Mexican wrestlers from his past.

title: Gone Astray
description: A diverse group of students are sent on a field trip that scares them straight and forces them to come to terms with the place for faith and God in their lives.

title: I Swear I'll Leave This Town
description: A young addict girl ends her time on rehab and returns to her hometown where she's welcomed by her family. Her father is running for mayor which is a surprise. Disenchanted with the politics and the things she sees, she decides to make some new changes in her life.
originalTitle: Prometo um Dia Deixar Essa Cidade

title: Through the Devil's Eyes
description: A mentally unhinged young man moves into a halfway house and one of the house mates is brutally murdered the same day. He sets out to prove his innocence by discovering the real killer.

title: Creating the Spectacle: Flying Free, Fledgling Flights
originalTitle: Creating the Spectacle!: Flying Free, Fledgling Flights

title: A Visual Lesson How Not to Write an Essay
description: Amidst intense writing of her autobiography something called her out. A shriek. A knock. A sound not all too familiar these days. Perhaps out of horror, curiosity or just the pure desire to hunt, the author left her room. In the darkness and the stillness of the room, a presence is known.

title: Why Did You Kill Me?
description: When Joseph, a young drug addict has a conflict with his friend Patty, his whole life changes... for the worse.

title: Real Eyes: Through His Eyes
description: Andreas was high as hell when two furious guys beat him up in a white tunnel while his girlfriend be raped. His mind is blown. He occasionally finds himself in an ambulance where the paramedics try to save his life. A rush of an LSD Trip.

title: Atwill Web Series
description: After two futile years of searching for his abducted daughter, fugitive MI5 hit man Clive Atwill allows himself to be "managed" by shady liquor store manager Nelson Chadwick - and becomes a target for enemies old and new.

title: Battered
description: TV stars, pro athletes, ex addicts, and two racist hicks from the South end up under one roof in a botched extortion attempt.

title: A Verdade Obscura
description: This feature film without dialogues or subtitles is a story that could happen anywhere, but charged of symbols and fears of the darker side of human mind, can bring, as well as different points of view, the dual challenge proposed by the film itself, to communicate without words, through the eyes, through the doubts... The main purpose is to feel the different reactions impacted by the movie on different cultures and places. So, this film was planned, since the beginning, for international audiences.

title: The Oracles of Richard Hopkins
description: After Richard Hopkins finds his childhood sweet heart's sister murdered, he must embark on a quest to find the murderer. Oh, and when he touches someone, he telepathically sees their thoughts.

title: Finding Mona Lisa: 313
description: Jocelyn Rainey's Finding Mona Lisa 313, is a comprehensive learning and travel experience in the visual arts for high school students. Dedicated to instilling the importance of art and art history in the youth of Detroit.

title: Middleman
description: After his pregnant wife is killed in a gruesome hit and run accident, a grieving Beijing real estate agent becomes obsessed with finding the driver and exacting revenge.

title: The Fox
description: An international assassin is sent to Iran on a mission to kill a nuclear scientist.

title: Surrounded
description: A woman finds herself home alone after her husband looks for work. A stranger shows up at her house, which is in the middle of nowhere.

title: Four Days Away from Two Light Years
originalTitle: Merchak Arbaa Yamim MiShte Shenot Or

title: West of Ventura
description: The whereabouts of a rare package filled with uncut diamonds becomes unknown. Local thieves, lovers, mob men, and families hunt down this prized possession for their own personal gain. Through the struggle of finding this package, human love and passion are exploited oddly enough through sin. These arbitrary citizens chase their immortality, which is ultimately deceiving only themselves from that fact that every human being will die someday. As they say, pride comes before the fall, and pride is overwhelmingly abundant in the city of Ventura.

title: El otro: no todo es lo que ves
I Am the Edge
description: A novelist with writer's block is mysteriously stalked by a drifter.

title: Misterios del pasado
description: MISTERIOS DEL PASADO straddling drama, fantasy and suspense, tells the story of a girl who tragically loses her brother.

title: The Woods
description: After being hunted down by the police and captured, a young man named Jack Roberts escapes jail only to be blamed for the crimes of a monster called "The Harrower." (From Website)

title: Focus Puller
description: After an accident involving a gun on the set of a B-movie leaves the 1ST AC position vacant, 2ND AC and boy-next-door Charlie Dunlap gets promoted. This places him squarely in the sights of the film's starlet Becca Mustaine. Becca, once a household name as a child has since aged into a recovering addict, quickly steals what keeps Charlie tethered to reality. With no medication to rely on and breaking his heart by continuing her affair with the films director, Charlie tries to keep it together but can't. With no one to help he finally succumbs to his hallucinations. Because in this allegory, and much like our world, the singular attempts of a madman to quiet his demons are never enough.

title: Stuck
description: An unnerved detective tries to figure out the three last cases in his life.

title: A Story About Wendy 2
description: Following on from A Story about Wendy (2012), when she was dumped by her fiancé and sought to get her life back together, Wendy Phillips returns in the second chapter of her adventures. Excited to start work at Quirky TV as Simone Davies' personal assistant, Wendy proves that she is dedicated and efficient. But when she inadvertently discovers information that reveals what really happened to Simone's previous assistants, Wendy realises that her life is in danger.

title: Parapaar
description: Communication gaps surface when a man returns home after a 14 year prison term and is finally forced to take his tormentor head on

title: Unhinged
description: After the murder of Samantha, detectives are looking to solve the case. The difficulty in solving the case may just take them in a new direction.

title: TV Guide Spotlight: TV's Spookiest Halloween Episodes
description: A direct to DVD collection of 13 Halloween stories.

title: The True Seeing
description: Alexa receives a beautiful antique mirror for her birthday from someone anonymous. She assumes it's her obsessive ex-boyfriend, but starts having terrifying hallucinations as she discovers the origins of her gift and its mysterious sender.

title: Quicksilver
description: After 009 betrays MI6, Bond goes after Bruce Silverman and his Quicksilver organization, who plot to destroy London as revenge for the death of his wife.

title: Sobrevivente Urbano
description: Sometimes in life, you have to take decisions, choose between take an action or leave. A wrong decision can change your life forever. URBAN SURVIVOR is this kind of story, Daniel see a crime and decide to film with his phone.

title: A Killer Conversation
description: On the same day a burglar wants to kill you and your ex wants to make up - and for the life of it, you can't decide which is worse.

title: Killing Off Connor
description: College T.A., Sally, finds herself duct taped to a tree in the middle of nowhere. She is told she will be freed if she helps her student, Connal, find the perfect ending he's been looking for.

title: Bait
description: A psychopath uses a new mobile dating app in his desperate search for love in an on-line world full of pretenders. When he is disappointed, he lashes out in violent and deadly ways.

title: Broken Vow
description: A murder is committed, and the body is missing. A young detective is on the case, but the murderer has a story of his own.

title: Wir Vier
description: Four friends have just graduated from high school. Freedom, independence and endless fun seem to lay ahead. Their plan is to spend a few nice days in the isolation of the austrian alps to enjoy freedom. but the situation gets out of control...

title: Cogito
description: David is trying to balance his life which is filled with drugs and partying when his nightmares begin to haunt him while he is awake.

title: Firewatch
description: A refreshing summer job at a local Fire Lookout Tower turns to nightmare when one of the watch goes missing, and the two youngest members are sent to check it out.

title: Who Killed $arah?!: Vol.1
description: We see a girl in her room after that penetrates its own mobile by an unknown destination.

title: Fourtouna Sto Ano Peukochori
description: Evil little Teletubbies are starting to conquer the world after an experiment goes wrong. The only place still standing is a village called Ano Peukochori and now it has to fight back.

title: Txt M
description: A mistaken identity TXT conversation, between a would be kidnapper and the woman who won't pay the ransom, spirals out of control.

title: Vista Point
description: Chet Beckwith drove to the Grand Canyon to find himself. And then he did.

title: Where's Dookie Cannata?
description: Ruby is having a bad day. If Ruby doesn't come up with $100,000 a crazy cop will rape and kill her. Mix in a rogue government agent stalking her, a crooked lawyer spending all her money, and she can't get her dead husband's ashes out of hock. To solve all her problems Ruby must find a wife beater named Dookie in order to satisfy his millionaire stripper wife. Will Ruby find Dookie before the crazy cop comes calling?

title: A Day in the City
description: The film explores how government officers function and talks about topics such as effective governance and national integration.

title: The Breaker
description: A man awakens with no memory of who he is or past events. He stumbles upon a house that holds the key to his past but also a dark secret.

title: Sometimes, It's the White Guy: Or How I Learned That Fanatics Aren't Always Middle Eastern
description: a filmmaker tells the story of an evangelical fanatic who terrorizes his ex-wife after she leaves him for a middle eastern.

title: The Rule of Lead
description: To redeem his soul, the ghost of a killer is sent to lead a neglected teenage girl to save two kidnapped children from the abuse of a criminal organization.

title: In Darkness We Live
description: Banks robbers hide out in a house where evil resides.

title: M-Theory
description: Movie is based on M-theory the last research of Albert Einstein in which a young professor and researcher Devdhar Mukherjee is trying to find the meaning of M, God and existence simultaneously coping up with the suicide of his father who was a scientist researching on M -theory and unexpected death of his mother who was a believer of God his parents died when he was only 8 years old. Devdhar is on the quest to find the meaning of M-theory. This movie deals with 11 dimensions of universe, concept of God, Life and Death explained in scientific and spiritual way.

title: El Norte
description: To fulfill his American Dream, Gael risks it all and crosses the border to an illegal point - only to encounter his worst nightmare.

title: If You Meant to Kill Me
description: A documentary film about three women imprisoned for their protection after being threatened to get killed for honor.

title: You Are Your Body/You Are Not Your Body
description: When four estranged siblings return to their Texas hometown for their mother's funeral, the youngest sister is abducted by a cult. In the attempt to rescue their sister, the family discovers the cult's terrifying plans for all of humanity.

title: Stained Glass
description: An ominous mirror reflects the darkest nature of several strangers as it traps them in a haunting psychological prison.

title: I Am Cursed
description: An unassuming man has a secret past. Trouble follows wherever he goes. Unknowingly, Lisa befriends him and soon discovers the truth behind his past.

title: Thin Ice
description: MAX, 25, wakes up every night haunted by a vision of old man's killing, but he doesn't know who that man is. He is stuck in a basement which is owned by mobster BOSS. He forces LOLA, Max's girlfriend, to organise kidnapping of a child of ANNA, young psychologist who is to solve the riddle of Max's memory disorder. Max is the last witness of the murder and only he may remember where is, so vital for the mobster, briefcase hidden. Anna seems to be powerless in front of Max's disorder. Lola and her colleges go desperate as they put under pressure of time. Things go wrong. Desperate Lola reveals a secret of Max disorder to him. Max losses his consciousness.

title: The Last Goodbye
description: After witnessing his father being violently beaten up 15 years ago, Arjun has never been the same since. Now, those people that came 15 years ago have come back and this time they want more then just a farm land.

title: Mobilecom
description: When doing business with the mafia, you may as well have the best wireless provider, your life may depend on it.

title: The Nether Experiment
description: When Brock and Landen, play their favorite video game, Minecraft, all hell breaks loose. When they play in the Netherworld, the Side Effects of the virtual hell start being unleashed into their reality. When it gets worse, they're physically and mentally transferred into the game, and must survive in order to escape and get out with their lives!

title: Meeting the Wickersons
description: A dark comedy that paints an unusually captivating portrait of an intriguing interview, where a parapsychologist, David Harvey, uncovers the secrets of the extrasensory perception phenomenon, remote viewing, through a clairvoyant, Eva Wickerson, and unexpectedly becomes a player in a dark secret housed in the walls of the Wickerson home.

title: DMTSoup
description: After being exposed to an ultra-rare powder, a drug dealer is met by a spiritual force that induces a life-altering ultimatum.

title: D-Effects
description: We must pay for the mistakes we make

title: Warning Label
description: Thriller/Suspense about a small family on their 10th anniversary. The husband, Joel Yates, has a newly discovered heart condition along to go with his drinking problem. Joel ignores the heart medication warning label along with a social media comment to re-post a young girls kidnapping/murder. Joel has a night of figments and nightmares due to ignoring the ''Warning Label'' that he will never forget.

title: Love Test by Ghost
description: It is about of love life of a normal Chinese lovers. Even if a small man, he also has a fair-dream.

title: The Afterparty
description: The Afterparty tells the story of journalist Robert Gordon. Robert's shady past as a detective turned journalist has caused more damage than he could ever imagine. After writing a series of predatory stories about a high profile celebrity, he is fired by the national newspaper for destroying their reputation. Gordon is soon after lured to a party by an old friend but quickly discovers that the party wasn't quite the night he was hoping for, as he finds himself being hunted down by a psychopath.

title: Let the Die Be Cast: Initium
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic world, two teenage Brothers face the struggle of their lives after stumbling across a Mediterranean village massacred years before by an aging Philosopher.

title: Red Trail 90
description: A troubled yet loving family man on a solo adventure deep in the wilderness has a gruesome accident and is the only witness to an unspeakable horror that forces him to fight for his life against a mysterious killer.

title: Turba
description: James Harles, the CEO of a bank which is in a financial abyss, hires Victoria Finler Kerry, a former senator with whom he had a secret affair six years ago. Between dream and reality, he realizes that she has a hidden agenda which will put his own life at risk as she will stop at nothing - even murder - to gain power.

title: The Falling Prey
description: The Falling Prey is a suspenseful crime 'who did it' horror film set in the city of Chicago during the 1970's and 1980's. A detective by the name of Reeves is looking for a murderer who preys on high school kids at their graduation parties. If Reeves doesn't solve this case soon, his little brother could become the next target. Meanwhile, we see the victims perspective of what happens on the night of these graduations when the serial killer is hunting them down one by one.

title: A Place in the Stars
description: A young lawyer gets a case he believes will make him rich. In the process he encounters dangerous men willing to kill to protect a fake and adulterated medical drugs trade worth billions in Nigeria. The outcome helps him come to terms with his life and resolve the clash of values he has had with his father all along.

title: Pastiche Vol1 No1
description: A phone call in the middle of the night. Women, drink, the cops.

title: Pretty Shakedown
description: Zenith, the female henchman takes no prisoners. Do not make her chase you down in her red bottoms. No one gets away with it. Not even Donnie.

title: Janmasthanam
description: Janmasthanam shows the atrocities done on women in today's world and gives a strong message of revolt against the ills that persist. Kumar (Sai Kumar) is a convict who fights for the rights of women. His past remains a mystery until the truth is revealed.

title: Young Americans
description: Lily, a runaway Puget Sound teenager, washes ashore on an unfamiliar island with no memory of how she got there. She takes refuge with the island's only inhabitants- four magnetic orphans who share a terrible secret.

title: Scum
description: A young man's return home becomes more than he bargained for as he discovers that an evil substance is quickly turning his sleepy Texas town in to a zombified nightmare.

title: Rest Days
description: An aspiring bodybuilder moves to LA in hopes of training with his mentor from YouTube, but his plans are quickly derailed by a shady porn director and murderous drug runner.

title: Blood Runs Black
description: An unmarried woman becomes convinced she's being attacked by a demonic entity after her carefully cultivated life collapses around her.

title: Ditch
description: A woman awakens having been buried in a ditch in the middle of nowhere after a night out, can she escape her fate and get home safely?

title: Grief
description: It's all fun and games till it's not...

title: The Mind of Turtle
description: Stick figures consume the imagination of a young lunatic in the strangest and most unbelievable movie from the film industry's next generation

title: Venezia impossibile
description: If in 1797, Napoleon did not conquer Venice maybe, in 1989, a series of mysterious crimes would have not happened in Murano, in the new Republic, led by the ruthless Doge, Anselmo Biaberini. Zero-budget full-length movie film made in Veneto and present at the Venice Film Market of the 70th Venice International Film Festival.

title: House of Shadows
description: The brighter the light, the darker the shadow. A story emerged from a mystery.

title: Kandiyohi
description: KANDIYOHI is an action packed modern-day western that brings the sleepy backdrop of rural Minnesota alive with violence and suspense. This breakout debut from writer and director Nicholas Engan tells the story of three down-on-their-luck friends drifting through life in their late-20s. After reconnecting during a visit to their hometown, a rapid spiral of drugs, shame, and betrayal will leave them with only one unbelievable option -- to rob the town's corrupt sheriff. When their plan goes fatally wrong, this group of friends will be pushed to the limit trying to outrun the law and its harsh brand of vengeance. It's all on the line in a cinematically stunning finale that will blow audiences away.

title: In Residence
description: Connor Wright reluctantly returns to his hometown after his estranged mother suddenly passes away. Tasked with managing the sale of the estate, he employs the help of Jessi and Alex, his childhood friends, to assist in the organization of things. As the trio bond again after years apart, events begin to transpire that suggest that they may not be alone in the now-vacant home. A terrible secret and the aftermath of some nefarious deeds of the past stalk the grounds of the residence, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

title: Jogo do Copo
description: A group of young actors is trying to raise funds for a new play, and in order to do so they decide to put together a Halloween party. One of the actors, however, takes a step further with a unique proposal that could help them make even more money: upon finding an old Ouija Board, Elizabeth suggests they could charge the guests a little more for playing the game of the spirits. Ultimately, the group accepts the idea and decides to test and try the Ouija Board before the party...but what starts as a fun game turns into a horrible nightmare when an ancient demon responds to the Ouija Board ritual. Now the group will have to face their worst fears as they try to control the evil forces they irresponsibly brought upon themselves.

title: Call-Back
description: On a cold Halloween night five teenagers start playing a game that over time has been forgotten. As the night progresses things turn nasty and past mistakes come back to haunt each and every one in the group.

title: Killing for Rachael
description: Simon Has Been Abused By Women Nearly All Of His Life. It Was Until He Meet Rachael Is Gothic Friend. Sharing A Interest Within Torture And Murder The Pair Decided That Maybe They Should Hunt Down Five Women Who Hurt Simon When He Was Younger With A Twist That Will Effect Anyone Who Knows Simon.

title: Not of This World
description: A SUPERNATURAL THRILLER ABOUT THE ETERNAL FIGHT BETWEEN GOOD AND EVIL

title: Breathing Mother
description: Everyone said they would go nowhere... and they did. A riddle of perfect love and perfect trust A punk rock band A wedding ceremony A hidden ritual beyond space and time In a story of love, purchased conception, and silent deception Sometimes the only redemption is to do no harm And sometimes the only way to make life possible is to take it away FRANK SOUTH, SUSAN SOUTH, MEDWIN SOUTH When there is only one true religion There can only be one who truly follows

title: The Argentum Prophecies
description: A dwindling clan struggles to survive in a remote, post-apocalyptic outpost, when an eccentric drifter enters their community and transforms their lives forever.

title: I'm Dead
description: Omar is a car thief. When his son asks for a gorilla mask to participate in a school play, Omar, who cannot afford it, decides to steal a car. However, the car Omar steals belongs to an underworld killer. Compounding the already difficult situation is a bag in the car. The bag, filled with currency notes, which the underworld killer does not want to release. And thereafter, a hunt begins...

title: The Slayers: Portrait of a Dismembered Family
description: Patrick claims his father The RT. HON Stanley Slayer killed a young woman in a satanic ritual and was forced to film the murder. Stanley says the film was Patrick's idea made with the help of family, friends and bucket loads of fake blood. Who is telling the truth...Patrick or Stanley?

title: The Dark Knight: Knightfall - Part Two
description: With the Dark Knight gone, a new hero named The White Knight tries to rally the remaining humans to revolt against the Crimson Empire.

title: Creature Double Feature
description: "Creature Double Feature" was Halloween special in October 2014 with Jake Maulin as "Count Jakeula" a Dracula type character.

title: Strangers in the park
description: Two strangers meet in a park bench.they talk silly things then share personal things to each other soon it become cat and mouse game

title: Convict
description: The film follows a man in jail who gets sentenced to death by hanging for committing rape, and the details of his life inside the jail and his relationships with his mates.

title: The Empty Headquarters Affair
description: Shot in the Virgin Islands and Hawaii, aboard a military transport plane, on a sunken wreck, and in lush mountain locations, this homage to 60's shows I Spy, Hawaii Five-O, and The Man From U.N.C.L.E. takes viewers on an intelligent thrill ride. When the theft of wonder drug Advantage 41 threatens to change the global balance of power, two enemies, an aging secret agent and a glamorous Hawaiian smuggler, must either grow more alike and succeed, or remain as they are and perish. A 'Making-of' closing title sequence reveals that this remarkable feature was accomplished by a team of unfunded, unpaid, time-pressured amateur film enthusiasts who overcame seemingly insurmountable obstacles. This endearing celebration of creativity and daring charmingly shouts: Go for it!

title: Komm Doch Nach
description: Dieter, a Bavarian in his prime, is on a hiking trip in the Swiss-Canton of Glarus. He has planned to meet a friendly hobbyist, but everywhere he goes he comes across the North German Ronja. What in the beginning seems to be a number of coincidences turns out to be a set-up by the young woman. There is something that Dieter is not aware of: He and Ronja share a dark episode in their past and Ronja seems to seek revenge.

title: Coffin Dreams
description: Coffin dreams is a surreal, dark romcom, thriller. When Nat wakes up in a coffin in the middle of nowhere she has no idea what's happened to her or how she will get out of the coffin. All of a sudden she passes out and wakes up back in her apartment with no memory of what just happened and a new roommate Lisa who's taken a romantic interest in her. Throughout the film we follow Nat as she tries to figure out which of the two realities is real and which one's a dream with the help of her friend Severine as she keeps waking up and passing out in the two different worlds. Can she figure it out before she lose her mind completely.

title: Neckface: Keg Carver
description: Graffiti artist Neckface teaches himself welding as he creates work for his exhibit "Drinkin' On The Job".

title: Kabadam
description: Kabadam, the film, the lead pair gets engaged and when they start getting closer to each other, they realize that they are at opposite poles, and all hell breaks loose. There is some intense romance and it is also a whodunit kind of thriller.

title: Lost Sunday
description: Backyard party in Long Beach, California featuring skateboarding, music, drugs and an underage girl. Unfortunately, It quickly becomes apparent that this is a lethal combination.

title: On a Country Road
