description: The Wounded Bird, a turn of the century painting, steeped in blood and misfortune, has turned up somewhere in Maine. It's presence alone, unknowingly brings four people to meet their inescapable fate.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 Playthrough
description: Combination of the series of Markiplier's "Five Nights at Freddy's 2" playthrough.

title: The Basement
description: The world is in turmoil after the mysterious disappearances of people all over the world. Nine individuals who find refuge in the basement of a church deal with issues of race, religion, and buried secrets.

title: Exit Node
description: Three art students from Germany are working on a documentary about pedophilia. Their struggle with the development of their film leads them into a different direction when they stumble upon the Darknet. During their journey across Europe they see themselves faced with frightening facts and moral issues within the group.

title: Fidelus
description: A grieving trail runner seeks solace in the woods. He discovers instead a prison.

title: Her Name Is Pinky
description: April Grant Always Had A Happy Life She Did Well Within Her Life Everything Went Well Until One Strange Night Out With Her Friends Everything Changed When They Discover A Strange Box On The Beach. Unaware That What Inside Is About Change Everyone Life And Leave Nothing But Bloodshed Her Only Connection A Man Named Albert Who Her Stalker Is Looking To Find But Her Stalker Isn't Anything Anyone Has Ever Seen Before She Has The Powers To Copy The Forms Of Other People And Will Stop At Nothing To Kill April Or Her Friends.

title: The First Step
description: Having just moved to a new home, a young girl is tormented by something in the basement.

title: Bibleo
description: Bibleo is a fanatsy, psychological thriller revolving around the fights between the invisible powers which are the main cause of every action, every birth and death on the earth. Mr. Bibleo is a physics professor doing research on Death and whether at the time of death any gate opens to the next life. But an unexpected event changes his life forever. He doesn't even know that he is becoming a warrior.a warrior of the creator of the universe and saviour of every creature. Now he has only 24 hours time to do the most dangerous task anyone has ever done. That is to defeat the most powerful and beautiful angel Named 'LUCIFER'.

title: Auxiliary Ego
description: Micky Avidan must help Amnon Pinto after he was arrested alongside many left wing protesters. She must obtain the legal aid of Carine Katz, who seems quite reluctant and suspicious.

title: Word for Word
description: The things you never had, you lose them too.

title: Replace
description: A man wakes up on the floor next to a corpse. Forced to prepare a testimony he explores the time since he moved into a shared apartment in the new city. His only help is a long distance call back home.

title: Mystery
description: Upon receiving an intriguing letter, Su Meike (Yixuan An), who is an orphan, travels to the address from which it came in the hope of finding relatives. Upon arrival, she learns that while the place has been torn down, its peculiar contents have been stored nearby. Unbeknownst to Su Meike, she is the descendant of well-known tomb raiders and the seemingly kind and helpful Zhong (Jiro Wang) is in fact the son of a rival grave robbing clan.

title: Los Scandalous - Skid Row
description: See what makes Skid Row tick, a tell all, never before seen, raw documentary about the harsh reality of the street life in Los Scandalous - Skid Row. The homeless capital of The United States. Watch through my lens, as I show the true gutter life in Los Angeles; from prostitution, homelessness, hard addiction, the drug dealers perspective, police corruption and the system designed to keep them all there. My name is Shanks Rajendran and I'm a 28 year old Australian filmmaker. I shot this documentary to uncover the truth about Skid Row, the people, the place, and the politics behind it.

title: Félix et les Loups
description: After a suicide attempt, a young easily influenced biologist is recruited by a criminal organization based in the hills above Nice.

title: Under a Kaleidoscope
description: Caleb Loomis, an agoraphobic twenty-something becomes friends with an abused neighbour, Beatrice, which in turn introduces him to a violent underworld criminal.

title: Tales of the Unnatural: The Experiment
Jorge & Alberto vs. The Neoliberal Demons
description: Jorge and Alberto, two magicians from Buenos Aires, are visited by the president with the task to rescue her daughter.
originalTitle: Jorge y Alberto contra los demonios neoliberales

title: Small World
description: An emotionally disturbed young man who enjoys petty acts of mischief believes he has picked up a curse from an ancient mask in a museum.

title: Have You Seen Enough?
description: An editor is hired to make sense of endless hours of security camera footage, footage that may have captured the brutal killings at 641 Vail St.

title: Los Reyes del Juego
description: Poker professionals gamble to win 10 millions. When one of them falls dead all become suspects.

title: Clipped Wings They Do Fly Music CD
description: This project is based on Mental Illness.

title: Renegade
description: Operatives from a secret organization known as 'Regimen' must recover the contents of a missing Briefcase while battling members of the Renegade faction and a mysterious gunman, who all share a common goal.

title: Sin Verite
description: A talented but self destructive actress falls under the influence of a group of renegade thespians, who shun film acting in order to practice their craft within increasingly dangerous real life scenarios.

title: Sokaistut
description: The Blinded is a neo noir feature film telling a story about divorce, betrayal and money.

title: Humor VS Action
description: Humor VS Action is comedy and action thriller. When two people with opposite personalities meet to solve a high profile case, things start to get a little out of hand and entertaining. Introducing Nischay Poovaiah and Nikith Poovaiah, the journey continues as each clue leads them to skeptical of each other. With breathtaking underwater fights and amazing scenic forest chases, this film brings the blend of wit and humor. In this suspense filled movie, nobody knows who will solve the case and who will be thrown into the dirt.

title: Lucid Depression
description: A short student film about an inner dark side. The struggle to connect and keep it hidden. The main character suffers from bipolar disorder. In her downfall she tries to stay connected with her friends, but fails terribly spiraling of into the darkness of her own mind. For then to revive and start the process all over again, a never ending loop.

title: Shadow Industry
description: Whilst on the hunt for an elusive debtor, a jaded debt collector - alienated from the world around him - meets a young woman who falls in love with the man that he could become. Set across the broad cultural landscape of London, this contemporary noir thriller gives a view of the city that is often experienced but rarely expressed. The story is occasionally interspersed by glimpses of the space in-between the lines, discreetly slipping into the story pausing the action into a surreal act for the audience to breathe.

title: Legacy
description: The Berbatovs are Nottinghams most successful crime family, but with rival gang led by Jackson Reid closing in on one side, and the police on the other, their time may have come to pass. When 'The Six', Stefan Berbatovs trusted captains are slaughtered, he must attempt to escape whilst he can, leading his wife and son across a city fraught with danger.

title: The Stick
description: The true story of three bad ideas working together to create a catastrophe.

title: Between Lives
description: In a world where everyone is unknowingly immortal, a pistol-packing priest fights to change what happens between lives.

title: Cheat
description: Tom Brummell and Jordie Jacobson are business partners. Their business is poker. They play for money in small independent games. Jordie organizes the games, fronts the stake money and finds the players. Tom plays them. He never loses. Tom is what is called a card mechanic. In other words: a cheat.

title: Journeyman
description: When Conner Riley is convicted wrongly of money laundering for the IRA, his half brother Michael (George McCluskey) offers to help. During the exodus from Ireland, Connors wife Olivia (Janet Adams) and son David (Lucas Eisele) begin to find out that Uncle Michael has dark secrets about why he was disowned by his father. Michaels past is far darker than they realise when his former Provisional IRA commander Daniel O'Neil (Paul Dewdney) seeks revenge for his imprisonment and takes Olivia hostage and forces Michael into an illegal boxing match. Michael must face his past to save his brother's wife and child from Daniels sinister intentions.

title: Omer Pasha Music Videos (American Television Edition)
description: This edition contains music videos based on California, Arizona, Arkansas, Maryland, Oklahoma, Massachusetts, Chicago, Wisconsin, Florida, Alaska, Nevada, New York, Wyoming and Missouri.

title: The Queen of Spades
description: Two lesbian girls perform a magical ritual to conjure up an evil spirit called the Queen of Spades.

title: 5 by 9
description: On Friday Evening ... Krysta had left a message on her answering machine. It told any potential caller that she planned on spending the final week of Summer Vacation doing as much partying as possible. So they could leave a message if they wanted to ... But they shouldn't expect to hear back from her until the new college semester had started. On Saturday Morning ... A very hungover Krysta awoke and found herself laying on a cold hard concrete floor. As she attempted to gather her thoughts, a loud chiming bell drew her attention to a computer monitor which kept flashing the following message. Don't Move ! ! ! For Your Own Safety ... Stay Perfectly Still ! ! ! Do not attempt to stand unless you have been told to do so! Do not attempt to cross the red line unless you have permission! You have been brought here to be trained as a slave. We do not wish to hurt you. But we will not hesitate to do so if you attempt to resist or escape.

title: Desert World of Black Souls
description: In this highly stylized tropical thriller, São Paulo is a city where the rich are black and the poor are white. Oscar, an ambitious lawyer of the black elite, accepts a job to deliver mobile phones in a prison for a member of the "Crime Foundation". He is robbed in traffic, loses the cell phone and finds himself being chased in a complex plot and in a relentless chase, while the "Crime Foundation" attacks the city. "Desert World of Black Souls" is the first feature film of director Ruy Veridiano. The film won a Honorable Mention for "Creativity and Courage in filmmaking by using the DJ spirit to create a narrative" at 18th Cine PE (Recife Film Festival - Brazil)

title: Attack of the Flesh Eating Subterranean Bog Monster from the Center of the Earth and Beyond the Moon: Apocalyptic Revenge!
description: After a person goes missing in the swamp, a professor tells the story of a similar case, and of the monster that lurks.

title: A Day with Bruh Slime
description: It all started when a group of friends playing Quake III stumbled across a world wide government conspiracy, and they have to prepare for - a day with Bruh Slime.

title: Counterclock
description: Counterclock is a crime thriller that takes the concept of time and centralizes it within a group of people who go back in time (Clockers) to prevent crimes from happening.

Retired US Marine awakes in a hotel room in Amsterdam. His girlfriend is nowhere to be found. A mysterious note sends him in search of her, on a journey through the shady streets of Amsterdam, only to discover the secret of '11.

title: Misao Playthrough
description: Combination of the series of Markiplier's "Misao" playthrough.

title: Le Rêve aux Loups, chronique d'un livre annoncé
description: Surreal thriller-style short film with a dialogue between the author and his main character, exchange perhaps sociologically visionary but above all nourished by absurd humor and European literary influences despite the apparent weapons.

title: Sugar Sisi
description: Two young women working in a remote location are raped by construction workers, leading them to seek brutal revenge.

title: Espejismo
description: Daniel, an insecure painter that has lost his way in the world, is guided by his subconscious on a surreal journey through madness and illusion to overcome his traumatic childhood and retake control over his life.

title: I'm Not Adam
description: Reality and illusion blur in this story about an ordinary guy who is mistaken for a celebrity that someone wants to kill.

title: The Baby Game
description: A father holds a birthday party for his daughter and hires a clown, the clown possesses and kills his daughter. A year or so later he starts to see ghostly images of his dead daughter.

title: Stranger at the Inn
description: After the host of a country inn takes in a charming young man for the night, she discovers that beneath his innocence lies a secret that will change their lives forever.

title: Omer Pasha Music Videos (Bollywood Edition)
description: A New Bollywood Cinema with a new trend of feature long dance music videos.

title: Joker: Start of a Joke
description: A look into the Joker and him giving the start of a joke experience to his very own victim.

title: Vile
description: The stakes raise to dizzying heights with every hand as twelve strangers play a heated game of poker that will determine the rest of their lives.

title: Compound
description: Seven kiwi travelers come face to face with their worst nightmares in an old abandoned haunted house attraction site in rural New Zealand.

title: Seven Things to Do Before You Die
description: It is the Last day before Katie graduates from university, she and six friends went into a soon-to-be demolished residential hall for a puzzle game, "Seven things to do before death". It's believed that if the puzzle is figured out, and the players have completed all of "Seven things", thus one can live a fulfilling life . However, after the first task is completed, one of the student suspiciously dies, and the rest are left feeling perplexed. Coincidently, a foreign student that was declared missing, suddenly shows up out of nowhere, and has self claimed proof that "Seven things to do before death" is an experiment to test the accuracy of Ancient Chinese Astrology, instead of the game they believed it to be. They were deceived, the "Seven things" were never about enriching people's lives, adversely , it could be the reason behind some of their deaths?

title: Memories & Guns
description: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a certain BERGMAN . His investigations lead him in a third-rate nightclub run by Jerry EDISON and his wife DANA. Meetings he already seems to know him and he always retains the place and the people a distant memory. In a dream world where time has no reason to exist the investigator discovers the mystery behind his mission.

title: Confidentiel
description: On a quiet secluded beach in eastern Long Island's North fork, a body is discovered, washed up and hidden amongst the seaweed and other discarded detritus, to be found by a dog-walker in the coarse and rocky sand of this otherwise picturesque and idyllic place. A pair of police detectives are horrified and set out to solve the case and wonder 'who could have done such a thing'?

title: Florist: The Confessions of a Beautiful Virtuoso
description: * The 1st feature film of Lee Hansang An early 20s, Jun-hyung is a florist working in a flower shop. He cares a lot of his reputation. He tries hard to keep his appearance impeccable. And he is a sort of narcissist. When he asked his girlfriend, Yoon-ha to move in with him, he felt that he owned everything. However, right at the moment, his trouble older brother Sang-hyeok intruded his house without notice. He never wanted to see his brother again after his few years in prison. With the sudden intruder, Jun-hyung's perfect world got out of control.

title: Quiet & Evil
description: This is a suspense film shooted in Ogasawara island.

title: How to Matter
description: This film centers around a young man (Sean Cassar) who is losing the ability to comprehend reality, which leads him to embark on an internal debate about which values are the most important.
A single Woman in NewYork, takes risks as a skilled thief on the streets around the city. But She doesn't know the danger of involving in this activity and the people behind her.

title: Binge
description: After making the conscious decision to go sober, an alcoholic's buried past is uncovered.

title: Loving Vhannie
description: Loving Vhannie introduces us to the determined and magnetic Detective Lang Peoples.Solving homicides in Kansas City is who he is; loving his woman Vhannie, is what he does. The city has seen an increase in murders over the last ten years, and Peoples finds himself heading most investigations. Tall, smooth and competent, he's the first to arrive and the last to leave. But on this night, he gets a call from his partner about a dead body at a swingers club. This won't be just any case, it soon becomes the most memorable case he's ever solved.

title: Crimson Pledge
description: At his retirement party, a beloved teacher, who should have been celebrated, has his secrets revealed among his family and ex-students.

title: Interrogating Catherine
description: The Interrogation of Catherine Watts. A modern day look at government sponsored intelligence, torture and interrogation methods.

title: The HR Guy
description: When Phil meets the new HR guy from work at a Corporate bar one morning, the HR guy is feeling guilty about having to let someone go. Phil takes it upon himself to teach him a thing or two about firing people and the ruthless reality of the business world .. But Phil's in for a surprise ..

title: Galactic Recon
description: 400 years in the future, a group of mercenaries are assembled by NESO to investigate the disappearance of space craft known as the Goliath, what they find puts their lives at risk as they struggle to escape the ship.

title: Graffito
description: A revolutionary street graffiti artist in Chicago wages a war of aesthetics against the capitalists. Unexpected romance threatens to ruin the film.

title: Eau Zoo
description: The human being is a sick animal. Its natural impulses and drive for self-development have been imprisoned by reason and culture. Lou and Martin, two adolescents living on an island, attempt to escape the suffocation of overprotective parents. Will they succeed in building trust in the midst of circumstances that drive them apart?

title: Tear of the Clouds
description: What happened at Tear of the Clouds Lake? In February 2013 Riley Armstrong, Kelly Kramer, Peyton Sampson, and Rick Stevens went to a cabin near Tear Of The Clouds Lake in the Adirondacks. They were not seen or heard from again. The only clues to what may have happened to them were found on camcorder and cell phone footage recovered at the cabin. The enclosed interviews along with the camcorder and cell phone footage has been released by Peyton's father in hopes that someone out there knows what happened to his daughter and can help bring closure to her disappearance. For information on the ongoing investigation, please visit the Facebook page Tear of the Clouds Disappearances.

title: Midnight in the Heart of Mancreet
Cut cheste
description: A group of friends decide to go on a road trip and stay in a bungalow for a couple of days where they face a series of unnatural ghostly experiences. How they escape from this situation is the rest of the story of Cut Chesthe.

title: Shadow Man
description: Indian horror-thriller about a trapped man.

title: The Cuckoo in the Clock
description: Eve and Lara are two desperate lovers from Bangor, Maine, who are on the run after Lara killed Eve's abusive, drug-dealing boyfriend and stole his money. They eventually take refuge in what appears to be an abandoned home deep in the woods south of the city. They soon encounter Nick, the handsome and charming caretaker who offers them sanctuary. The situation quickly descends, however, into a dangerous three-way dance of temptation and jealousy until a terrifying secret is revealed that threatens to destroy Lara and Eve unless they can find a way to escape the hell that they have created for themselves.

title: No Daylight
description: This is a true to life depiction of the Los Angeles prostitution underworld as captured by a former member of the Federal Bureau of Investigation during the sting OPERATION NO DAYLIGHT. The operation was responsible for tracking and dismantling a dangerous prostitution gang known as THE RACK who were the suspects amidst an investigation concerning several deaths of female sex workers on Century and Imperial Blvds, two very popular prostitution tracks in the city of Los Angeles. The film follows a madam involved in the life who is longing to reunite with her son, a broken family with children involved and a mother forced to commit sexual acts while her infant daughter watches. A film that will scar you to the heart.

title: The Marionette
description: A beautiful young artist Barbara has died in a fire at her studio. Her death appearing to be accidental, has destroyed her sister Lorena, a talented photographer, to the extent that she has started seeing a specialist to overcome the trauma. With the help of the psychiatrist Fernando, Lorena tries to analyze her feelings and recover from the death of her sister, but her strong armor resists these efforts and affects her work so her first photography exhibition following the death of Barbara turns out to be a complete failure.

title: Stan Lewis et la revanche des déchus
Besatt
description: When the big battle happened in heaven and God threw Satan down to earth, the struggle was so strong that it gave echo throughout the universe. When the fight was most intense, a tear was opened to another dimension. And a being slid through.

title: LK_Film_1
description: This is about me.

title: iWitness
description: IWitness is a thriller set inside an English caravan park which centres on the young and recently injured (wheelchair bound) landlord. His only contact with other people is his daily visits from a nurse and the sporadic interactions from his caravan tenants. As he physically recuperates in confinement, he becomes more and more dependent on his CCTV, internet and phone texts for information about the outside world. This removal from reality starts to corrupt his mind, plunging him into the depths of uncertainty and exposing him to a later day cabin fever.

title: Tactical Operations
description: A lost and alone individual named Matthew Harris AKA "Ozone"; a former private of the US Army now finds himself to be an important piece to a large and mysterious puzzle. A government operative named Andrew Morrison; now having taken custody of the soldier, goes through the events of Harris's dark and unanswered past. As Morrison wishes to discover what happened to a particular military sergeant named Sean Miller. AKA "Phantom". Who is formerly Missing in Action. As Harris was the last one to see the man alive. Now a potential ghost.

title: Killervision
description: While watching B grade movies a brain-injured man is tormented by visions of his friends being murdered by a faceless killer. He becomes increasingly disturbed when he realizes it's only a matter of time before the killer comes for him.

title: The Invited
description: Mystery Thriller Film Directed By Matthew Ewald.

title: Okie Down
description: 'OKIE DOWN' the feature film is a neo-noir suspense drama set in a small American Midwest town in which a confluence of domestic issues between several town folk spirals out of control and unravels into a murder mystery with no clear origins. The film navigates its characters through a rural culture's unknowing traditions at a time when something must change.

title: Scarecrow
description: When 17 year old Sarah's father commits suicide, she and her mother move to a new home in the country. Soon, Sarah realises that the house has a mysterious past and that her new start may not be as idealistic as planned.

title: Revenge Fantasies, Inc.
description: A former bank executive convinces two wannabe revolutionaries to assist him in kidnapping the vice president of a bank. They take him on an apology tour of foreclosure victims and get more than they bargained for.

title: Naklin
description: A man goes on a shamanic journey to Canada after making an impulsive decision.

title: Pendulum - a tale of time
description: A time travel drama that imagines an incident in three different time frames where several lives are interrelated with each other

title: Three Tutus and a Gun
description: Coming of age...with a gun.

title: Off the Grid: Story of Sacred Valley
description: This postmodern dystopian thriller takes place after the complete collapse of the American economy, in a time when people are desperate to find new ways to survive on their own without the help of the corrupt government falling down around them. For some, that means finding their way to Sacred Valley, a co-op, to start a new life, growing their own food and living off the land the way our ancestors have done. But Sacred Valley has secrets of it's own, with a hidden treasure dating back to a sunken World War II German U-boat. But the dead who protect that secret, are determined to lead the right descendant to it. As Sacred Valley's new occupants start dying one by one, Kayla determines that it's up to her to figure out why so that Sacred Valley can continue to be a safe haven for those who need it. She must put aside her fears and confront the hidden layers of deceit that plaque those who have found a home there.

title: Bait
description: A gay psychopath uses a new mobile dating app in his desperate search for love.

title: L'altro Adamo
description: In the near future, Adam asks the evolved artificial intelligence of his computer to create a double that lives a short space of real life, made of ideals, authentic values, passions.

title: Espionage
description: The unlikely head of a covert agency issues leads an agent on a deadly mission.

title: Confessions
description: Australia's first ever truly Independent Film about secrets, lies, love and the choice between an unconditional love or life.

title: Seguir viviendo
description: Two children, under a death threat run away from Juarez, join a journalist, who has just lost his son in a car accident, to become a new family.

title: Skeletons
description: Tom, Rachel and Vincent are all people going through dark times in their lives. Living as social recluses their paths cross with truly cataclysmic outcomes. Skeletons is a look at the intimate details of their lives including each of their vices. At times uncomfortable but incredibly real, Skeletons is a voyeuristic assessment of what goes on behind closed doors.

title: Cítrico
description: A prank call gives start to a never ending predicament.

title: O gemu - yonju hachinichi ato kohen
Plague of Misery
description: Plague of Misery a short film which takes a disturbing look into one woman's obsession that pushed her over the edge to a vicious cycle of destruction.

title: Uzvadd
description: Uzvadd (Brilliance) is a 2014 Indian Konkani-language suspense drama film directed by M.S. Dawan Rivoncar, starring John D'Silva and Paulu Nagraj in lead roles.

title: The Cure
description: A hired assassin battles time & powerful forces to rid himself of a prototype antitoxin that's been shoved into his bloodstream.

title: Ingrid: Into the Darkest Hour
description: A young woman, motivated by her own haunted past, travels hundreds of miles and deep into the lives of strangers to help find justice for the victims of a terrible crime that took place on an elite college campus.

title: Meridian
description: Alex Martin is on the run when the devil comes to fulfill an ancient prophecy that links directly to her. Only with the help of a priest and a young cop will she survive.

title: Terra Limes
description: The two explorers Vallier and Gregson are traveling through an as yet unexplored area of a rain forest looking for unknown species of butterflies. They are accompanied by their interpreter Cook and a group of porters. Vallier is suffering from a jungle fever but tries to hide this fact from the rest of the group. Gregson is fascinated by the colorful butterflies. Cook tries to convince the others to return to the town they started from. As they reach a strange dark tunnel formed by climbing plants Cook manages to persuade the porters to turn back. Vallier and Gregson are left alone without any provisions and without the cage with the butterflies they have already collected. Despite the complications they decide to go on towards, because Vallier is obsessed with the idea of the unique black butterfly. In 100 years, only one copy is born and it is said to have very special skills. Driven by this fact, they exceed the TERRA LIMES

title: Fame Game
description: They were lured there as part of a game - a reality game show. But now they can't tell if it's a game or something far more sinister.

title: Justice Devil
description: A gang member escapes to another country to start a new life only to have her daughter murdered by the gang members.

title: Paraplegicslist
description: Birthed in violence a new villain is born now three detectives job is to bring him down before they or someone else becomes his next victim

title: Edward
description: When Edward, a buffoonish Spirit Hunter, repeatedly fails to banish a bathroom spirit, he inadvertently uncovers a disheartening truth.

title: Decisions
description: After Jim's girlfriend breaks up with him he truly realizes all of his life problems, and he decides to resolve these problems with the power of violence. Is it the right thing to do?

title: Raid
description: Jake, thought dead, is back and finds many changes have taken place during his absence. His twin brother Chris is running things, funding a drug factory by organizing elaborate security van raids.

title: The Demon's Odyssey
description: When a Shape-Shifting God is exiled to Earth to live out his life as a Demon, he discovers an unborn half-human, half-vampire baby that he thinks could be his ticket back to Godhood. The vampire, Alucard and his human bride, Brigit and their friends hire a Monster Hunter named Van Keizer to stop the Demon.
